snippet: Mobile apps offer news and opinion on politicians and issues, and even information straight from Congress and the White House.
abstract: Kit Eaton App Smart column reviews mobile applications that offer news and opinion about American politics; notes Angry Birds series has new spinoff called Angry Birds Stella.
